item.title: Basics and Key Concepts of Elasticsearch
item.description: Getting Started with Elasticsearch Basics _This article is part of a series. Check out the full seriesÂ [icon name=“external-link” class=“” unprefixedclass=“”] This week finally I started learning Elasticsearch, I decided to keep some notes and share my concepts and understanding on this blog. So that if anyone wants to learn Elasticsearch he/she can learn with me. In this part, I will write about the some Elasticsearch theory and basic concepts anyone needs to understand.
